mapper.select: SELECT /* homes.common.mapper.CommonMapper.selectSidoList 시도목록 조회 */ AREACD AS ARCODE , AREANM AS ARNAME , AREA_FULLNM AS ARFULLNM , CASE WHEN SIDOCD = SUBSTR(#{arcode}, 1, 2) THEN 'selected' ELSE '' END AS SELECTED FROM TB_CM_COAREACODE WHERE SGGCD = '000' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDR ASC

SELECT /* homes.common.mapper.CommonMapper.selectSggList 시군구 조회 */ AREACD AS ARCODE , AREANM AS ARNAME , AREA_FULLNM AS ARFULLNM , SDSGGCD AS SDSGGCD , CASE WHEN SDSGGCD = SUBSTR(#{arcode}, 1, 5) THEN 'selected' ELSE '' END AS SELECTED FROM TB_CM_COAREACODE WHERE SIDOCD = SUBSTR(#{arcode}, 1, 2) AND SGGCD != '000' AND EMDCD = '000' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AREACD ASC

SELECT /* homes.common.mapper.CommonMapper.selectEmdList 읍면동 조회 */ AREACD AS ARCODE , AREANM AS ARNAME , AREA_FULLNM AS ARFULLNM , SDSGGCD AS SDSGGCD , CASE WHEN SDSGGCD = SUBSTR(#{arcode}, 1, 5) THEN 'selected' ELSE '' END AS SELECTED FROM TB_CM_COAREACODE WHERE SIDOCD = SUBSTR(#{arcode}, 1, 2) AND SDSGGCD = SUBSTR(#{arcode}, 1, 5) AND EMDCD != '000' AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AREACD ASC
